description: Standards: confirm canonical payload field conventions (tenantId required, actor fields, previous/new for transitions, updatedFields/changes) and document them in PRD ยง6
Infrastructure: add/extend shared event publishing helper(s) so domain code can publish workflow events consistently (tenantId + actor enrichment, correlation/idempotency hooks)
Schema registry: add payload schemas + registrations for all proposed catalog events (payload.*.v1) so simulator and trigger mapping can resolve schemas

Event bus schema/types: update shared event bus schema/types to include expanded event types + payload validation; resolve overlaps/renames explicitly (ticket message/comment, scheduling appointment/schedule entry)
Catalog migration: add idempotent upsert migration(s) that insert/update system_event_catalog entries for all events in event-proposals.md with category/name/description + payload_schema_ref
Simulation: verify simulator can submit every catalog event using payload_schema_ref (form mode + JSON mode), including schema validation failures
Tickets: emit transition events (TICKET_STATUS_CHANGED, TICKET_PRIORITY_CHANGED, TICKET_ASSIGNED, TICKET_UNASSIGNED, TICKET_REOPENED, TICKET_ESCALATED, TICKET_QUEUE_CHANGED)
Tickets: emit relationship/aggregation events (TICKET_MERGED, TICKET_SPLIT)
Tickets: emit communication events (TICKET_MESSAGE_ADDED, TICKET_CUSTOMER_REPLIED, TICKET_INTERNAL_NOTE_ADDED) or map to existing comment events per PRD ยง7.3
Tickets: emit work tracking event (TICKET_TIME_ENTRY_ADDED) with consistent payload conventions
Tickets: emit SLA stage events (TICKET_SLA_STAGE_ENTERED, TICKET_SLA_STAGE_MET, TICKET_SLA_STAGE_BREACHED) when SLA module is enabled
Tickets: emit approval events (TICKET_APPROVAL_REQUESTED, TICKET_APPROVAL_GRANTED, TICKET_APPROVAL_REJECTED) when approvals exist/enabled

Scheduling: emit appointment/schedule events (APPOINTMENT_CREATED, APPOINTMENT_RESCHEDULED, APPOINTMENT_CANCELED, APPOINTMENT_COMPLETED, APPOINTMENT_NO_SHOW, APPOINTMENT_ASSIGNED) or map to SCHEDULE_ENTRY_* per PRD ยง7.3
Scheduling: emit availability block events (SCHEDULE_BLOCK_CREATED, SCHEDULE_BLOCK_DELETED)
Scheduling: emit capacity alert event (CAPACITY_THRESHOLD_REACHED) when capacity thresholds are configured
Scheduling/Field Ops: emit dispatch lifecycle events (TECHNICIAN_DISPATCHED, TECHNICIAN_EN_ROUTE, TECHNICIAN_ARRIVED, TECHNICIAN_CHECKED_OUT) when supported
Projects: emit project lifecycle events (PROJECT_UPDATED, PROJECT_STATUS_CHANGED)
Projects: emit task lifecycle events (PROJECT_TASK_CREATED, PROJECT_TASK_ASSIGNED, PROJECT_TASK_STATUS_CHANGED, PROJECT_TASK_COMPLETED)
Projects: emit dependency events (PROJECT_TASK_DEPENDENCY_BLOCKED, PROJECT_TASK_DEPENDENCY_UNBLOCKED)
Projects: emit approval events (PROJECT_APPROVAL_REQUESTED, PROJECT_APPROVAL_GRANTED, PROJECT_APPROVAL_REJECTED) when approvals exist/enabled
Billing: emit invoice lifecycle events (INVOICE_SENT, INVOICE_STATUS_CHANGED, INVOICE_DUE_DATE_CHANGED, INVOICE_OVERDUE, INVOICE_WRITTEN_OFF) in addition to existing invoice events
Billing: emit payment events (PAYMENT_RECORDED, PAYMENT_APPLIED, PAYMENT_FAILED, PAYMENT_REFUNDED)
Billing: emit credit events (CREDIT_NOTE_CREATED, CREDIT_NOTE_APPLIED, CREDIT_NOTE_VOIDED)
Billing: emit contract events (CONTRACT_CREATED, CONTRACT_UPDATED, CONTRACT_STATUS_CHANGED, CONTRACT_RENEWAL_UPCOMING)
Billing: emit recurring billing run events (RECURRING_BILLING_RUN_STARTED, RECURRING_BILLING_RUN_COMPLETED, RECURRING_BILLING_RUN_FAILED)
CRM: emit client events (CLIENT_CREATED, CLIENT_UPDATED, CLIENT_STATUS_CHANGED, CLIENT_OWNER_ASSIGNED, CLIENT_MERGED, CLIENT_ARCHIVED)
CRM: emit contact events (CONTACT_CREATED, CONTACT_UPDATED, CONTACT_PRIMARY_SET, CONTACT_ARCHIVED, CONTACT_MERGED)
CRM: emit interaction/note events (INTERACTION_LOGGED, NOTE_CREATED)
Tags: emit tag definition and tag application events (TAG_DEFINITION_CREATED, TAG_DEFINITION_UPDATED, TAG_APPLIED, TAG_REMOVED) with generic entityType/entityId payload shape
Documents: emit storage lifecycle events (DOCUMENT_UPLOADED, DOCUMENT_DELETED)
Documents: emit association events (DOCUMENT_ASSOCIATED, DOCUMENT_DETACHED)
Documents: emit system-generation event (DOCUMENT_GENERATED) for generated docs (invoice PDFs, exports, etc.)
Documents: emit signature events (DOCUMENT_SIGNATURE_REQUESTED, DOCUMENT_SIGNED, DOCUMENT_SIGNATURE_EXPIRED) when e-sign is supported
Email: emit inbound reply event (INBOUND_EMAIL_REPLY_RECEIVED) when reply parsing/matching succeeds
Email: emit outbound lifecycle events (OUTBOUND_EMAIL_QUEUED, OUTBOUND_EMAIL_SENT, OUTBOUND_EMAIL_FAILED) for provider send attempts
Email: emit delivery/feedback events (EMAIL_DELIVERED, EMAIL_BOUNCED, EMAIL_COMPLAINT_RECEIVED, EMAIL_UNSUBSCRIBED) where provider support exists
Notifications: emit delivery lifecycle events (NOTIFICATION_SENT, NOTIFICATION_DELIVERED, NOTIFICATION_FAILED, NOTIFICATION_READ) for supported channels
Surveys/CSAT: emit survey lifecycle events (SURVEY_SENT, SURVEY_RESPONSE_RECEIVED, SURVEY_REMINDER_SENT, SURVEY_EXPIRED) and CSAT alert event (CSAT_ALERT_TRIGGERED)
Integrations: emit sync lifecycle events (INTEGRATION_SYNC_STARTED, INTEGRATION_SYNC_COMPLETED, INTEGRATION_SYNC_FAILED)
Integrations: emit webhook receipt event (INTEGRATION_WEBHOOK_RECEIVED) with safe raw payload handling
Integrations: emit connection health events (INTEGRATION_CONNECTED, INTEGRATION_DISCONNECTED)
Integrations: emit token lifecycle events (INTEGRATION_TOKEN_EXPIRING, INTEGRATION_TOKEN_REFRESH_FAILED)
Integrations: emit mapping/config change event (EXTERNAL_MAPPING_CHANGED) for external mapping updates
Assets: emit asset lifecycle events (ASSET_CREATED, ASSET_UPDATED, ASSET_ASSIGNED, ASSET_UNASSIGNED, ASSET_WARRANTY_EXPIRING)
Media: emit file/media pipeline events (FILE_UPLOADED, MEDIA_PROCESSING_SUCCEEDED, MEDIA_PROCESSING_FAILED)
